step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Ensure your palm and fingers are open wide.
Make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles.
Open your hand while exhaling and relaxing. Visualize fluid moving.
Great job on the second rep! Continue to keep your arm straight overhead.
Keep that palm and fingers spread wide.
Remember to inhale as you make a fist and tighten your muscles.
Exhale and relax your hand. You're doing well visualizing the lymph flow!

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Overhead Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Focus on opening your hand wide and then making a fist while inhaling, and relaxing while exhaling. Keep up the good work visualizing the lymph flow!
